title: Wind Engineering
description: An introductory course on wind energy and its potential; modeling and design of wind turbines; analysis of the economic benefits of wind turbine systems.  Credit not allowed for both ME 4701 and AE 4701.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and (PHYS 2211 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHYS 2231 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
